P

Player - Class in core
An object that contains the players name, their number, an icon, and input and output data streams
Player(Socket) - Constructor for class core.Player
The Player constructor.
Player() - Constructor for class core.Player
Constructor for creating computer players
player - Variable in class network.GameThread.InputListener
The player the class is listening for
player1 - Variable in class core.Connect4
Player object representing the first player (Will always be human player)
player1 - Variable in class network.GameThread
The first player for this individual game (Will always be human)
player1Turn - Variable in class core.Connect4
Used to determine which player's turn it currently is (true for player 1, false for player 2)
player2 - Variable in class core.Connect4
Player object representing the second player (Can be human player or computer player)
player2 - Variable in class network.GameThread
The second player for this individual game (Can be human or computer)
PLAYER_1 - Static variable in class core.Player
 
PLAYER_2 - Static variable in class core.Player
 
playTurn(int, Player) - Method in class core.Connect4
Process the turn for the current player.
playTurn(int) - Method in class network.Connect4Client
Send the selected column to the game server for input
PORT - Static variable in class network.Connect4Server
Port that the server is listening on
